findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The owner-only functions (updateUniswapRouter, updateUniswapPair, setAutomatedMarketMakerPair, setMarketingWallet, setTeamWallet, setCustodianWallet, setDelayAfterBuy) can be used to upgrade the contract's logic without restriction, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.
findings.function: Multiple (updateUniswapRouter, updateUniswapPair, setAutomatedMarketMakerPair, setMarketingWallet, setTeamWallet, setCustodianWallet, setDelayAfterBuy)

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The mint function allows for an unlimited number of sundae tokens to be created without any restrictions.
